name: YakamaIchishkíinTáymunt
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
This Yakama Ichishkiin Táymunt skill shares, in the Ichishkiin Tribal Language, the news of the current reservation and ceded ares of the Confederated Tribes and Bands of the Yakama Nation in modern-Washington state written by three Heritage University student interns and the staff at the Yakama Nation Language program. 

The Ichishkiin language is extremely endangered due to the impacts of colonization and the residential boarding schools, while at many different stages of revitalization within our tribal community. This flash briefing serves to help show that the news and happenings of our community can still be described in our language with minimal or no English.

There is currently no plan to share an English translation of these briefings alongside these Ichishkiin recordings.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
